title: The Wheat farmer
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A study of life, the problems, and the importance of the wheat-farmer of the middle western States of USA. Produced in collaboration with W. Herbert and B. Hartwig PhD Cornell University.
